author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

There are still few phase-2 geometries in release for which we don't run the HLT step. Thus the HLT DQM and validation sequences (and harvestings) get run without purpose. This lead e.g. to the issue described at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47352#issuecomment-2667155969 in which wf 24034.0 (that runs the `@fake2` menu) was trying to consume HLT collection that were not present on file.
This PR introduces a  `@phase2FakeHLT` (DQM) `@phase2ValidationFakeHLT` (Validation) sequences that can be run in phase-2 workflows in which there is no intention to run the HLT step (similarly as for what is done in Run3).

#### PR validation:

   * `runTheMatrix.py -l phase2` runs fine
   * `runTheMatrix.py -l 24034.0 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos` runs fine (this is for a geometry in which we don't run )

title: introduce `@phase2FakeHLT` and `@phase2ValidationFakeHLT` DQM / Validation sequences
